alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Christian; Graves; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 10:45AM EST until January 02 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch along the Kentucky and Tennessee border. Ice accumulations of a light glaze will also be possible over parts of southern Graves and Calloway counties. * WHERE...Graves, Calloway, Trigg, Christian and Todd Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on elevated surfaces, such as bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures at or slightly below freezing through the day and the rapid movement of this winter system, minor accumulations of snow will develop during the midday and early afternoon hours. Any road or sidewalk areas still wet by sunset will freeze. Use caution while driving or traveling by foot in the advisory area through early this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
